##	blog-x-ping - Sample Ping server list
##		http://system-x.info/?pageid=26&menutree=61
##
##		A lightweight yet powerful library to automatically ping blog
##		aggregator services to notify them of updated syndication	feeds,
##		using Weblogs.Com XML-RPC compatible pinging services.
##
##	entries in the file loaded by blog-x-ping will be pinged in the 
##	order in which they appear in the file, entries consist of the 
##	url to the desired ping server, which must	contain an http:// 
##	string at the	start and can optionally include a path to the ping
##	XML-RPC server if it is required, and a port number preceded by a 
##	colon (:) for the ping server if it isn't running on the standard
##	HTTP port (port 80)
##
##	e.g.
##	http://testping.test.test:8080/testping
##
##	entries can also include an optional case sensitive ping type
##	description string containing either weblogUpdates.ping or if the
##	ping server supports extended pings weblogUpdates.extendedPing
##	the ping type description must be preceded by a comma (,) 
##
##	e.g.
##  http://testping.test.test:8080/testping,weblogUpdates.extendedPing
##	or
##  http://testping.test.test:8080/testping,weblogUpdates.ping
##
##	if the ping type description is not specified it defaults to
##	weblogUpdates.ping as this is the most commonly supported ping
##	type.
##
##	lines can be commented out by adding two hash symbols (##) as the
##	first two characters on the line, all lines starting this way will
##	be ignored by the do_ping command, the system also ignores lines
##	which contain nothing but white space.

http://blogsearch.google.com/ping/RPC2,weblogUpdates.extendedPing
##http://api.moreover.com/RPC2,weblogUpdates.extendedPing
http://api.feedster.com/ping.php
##http://bulkfeeds.net/rpc
http://ping.feedburner.com/rpc.php
http://ping.feeds.yahoo.com/RPC2
http://ping.syndic8.com/xmlrpc.php
http://ping.weblogalot.com/rpc.php
##http://rpc.blogrolling.com:80/pinger/ 
http://rpc.pingomatic.com/RPC2
##http://rpc.tailrank.com/feedburner/RPC2
http://rpc.technorati.com/rpc/ping
http://rpc.weblogs.com/RPC2,weblogUpdates.extendedPing
##http://www.blogpeople.net/servlet/weblogUpdates
##http://rpc.icerocket.com:10080/
